snippet.title: Looking for eucalyptus oil?: Koala strolls into chemist
snippet.content: A curious koala has paid a visit to a pharmacy on the border of New South Wales. Photographs shared by showed the bright-eyed marsupial in the middle of the store on Friday afternoon. The post explained the animal had walked through the door on its own, before taking a look around. "He got some free pharmacy advice then headed to the tree up the road," the pharmacy wrote on their Facebook page. Nearly 5000 people have liked the images, with many commenting "only in Australia". (C) Nine Digital Pty Ltd 2017
